Container.Name: Valheim
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Valheim and run it.
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container download at startup. (https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

Config.Name: GAME_PARAMS
Config.Description: Enter your extra start up commands for the server here otherwise leave empty.

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Server Password if not needed leave empty (you can only leave the password empty if you set Public Server to '0').

Config.Name: Public Server
Config.Description: List Server as Public (set to '0' to disable or set to '1' to enable | when set to Public play '0' then you can leave the password blank).

Config.Name: UDP - Game Port Range
Config.Description: UDP Game Ports (If you need another port delete this Entry and create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port range | GAME_PORT +2 | also don't forget to click on show more and change the GAME_PORT)

Config.Name: GAME_PORT
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing (intital GAME_PORT | Dont forget to create create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port range and delete the default port range | GAME_PORT +2)

Config.Name: UID
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: GID
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!

Config.Name: Debug Log Output
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!
